column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I noticed a complaint about the price of the drinks.  I have to be honest
column3: so I don't know what market price is around here.  Honestly
column4: I think most of the craft cocktails at Del Frisco's are in that same range
column5: and this was certainly no Del Frisco's.   But
column6: I do not think $14 for a craft cocktail was unreasonable.
